column1: '''Gollum's Riddle''' is a song whose score was written by [[Maury Laws]] for the [[1977]] [[The Hobbit (1977 film)|film adaptation]] of the ''[[The Hobbit]]''. It follows the riddle [[Gollum]] proposes to [[Bilbo Baggins|Bilbo]] until the ending line.
It lies behind stars and under hills
It comes first and follows after
The answer is dark; the dark
